name: JetAge, s.r.o.
about: JetAge, s.r.o. is a reputable flight school located in Bratislava and Trencin, Slovakia, approved to provide comprehensive ATPL(A) ab-initio training programs. We specialize in professional pilot training, offering a range of courses including PPL(A), VFR Night, PIC CC, IR, MEP, CPL, and ATPL(A). Our training is conducted using state-of-the-art aircraft, ensuring students receive the highest quality education. With a focus on safety, comfort, and advanced avionics, JetAge is committed to preparing future pilots for successful careers in aviation. Our experienced instructors and modern facilities make us a leading choice for aspiring pilots. At JetAge, we are dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals.
services:
["Flight license - flight permit
LAPL(A) light aircraft pilot
Private airplane pilot - PPL(A) / SEP(Land)
Commercial Airplane Pilot - CPL(A)
Airplane transport pilot - ATPL(A)
